title: President phones families of martyred soldiers for condolence
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 24 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Tuesday telephoned the families of solders martyred in a recent attack took place in Panjgur area of Balochistan, targeting the security forces.
The president telephonically interacted with the bereaved family members of martyred Lance Naik Muhammad Younus Khan, Lance Naik Faridullah Khan, Lance Nailk Abdul Razzaq and Sepoy Asad Ali.
He paid tribute to the martyred soldiers for their services to the country and appreciated their sacrifices and valour.
The president prayed to Allah Almighty to grant high ranks to the martyred soldiers in the paradise and strength to the bereaved families to bear loss with fortitude.
